Package org.fluentjdbc

Interface DatabaseBulkUpdatable<ENTITY,SELF extends DatabaseBulkUpdatable<ENTITY,SELF>>

All Known Implementing Classes:
DatabaseBulkInsertBuilder, DatabaseBulkUpdateBuilder, DbContextBulkInsertBuilder, DbContextBulkUpdateBuilder
public interface DatabaseBulkUpdatable<ENTITY,SELF extends DatabaseBulkUpdatable<ENTITY,SELF>>
Fluently create a statement for a list of objects which updates values, ie INSERT or UPDATE
